lender.name: cassien
lender.loan_because: i believe in paying it forward. Everyone is waiting to experience the kindness of others. It gives power back to the individual, and not to the big money eating instituitions.
lender.occupational_info: I do artisan breads. I am self taught. I love what I am doing. I sell my breads at food markets.

lender.name: graham
lender.loan_because: if i can make a small difference to somebody's life for the better & i can i will.
lender.occupational_info: build new houses & repairs

lender.name: Syed Ali
lender.loan_because: It will make positive changes in other's lives.
lender.occupational_info: A socially conscious family man from Lucknow with great upbringing by my parents.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because:
I believe that supporting small business in less advantaged countries is vital - more vital than plain charity. Helping these countries to build a strong, self-sustaining economy is the best gift we can give.
I have a special interest in supporting female entrepreneurs in war-torn countries and other places where females are traditionally under-privileged.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: i can so i should
lender.occupational_info: help people get stronger after they are sick or after surgery

lender.name: Breeze
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I am a travel consultant and interested in how people live all around the world

lender.name: Filipine
lender.loan_because: I truly belive in microcredit as an important tool to make life easier for hard working individuals. I wish you the best of luck with your business!

lender.name: WILY
lender.loan_because: We need support both financial and material to hold our fitness and health awareness events.
lender.occupational_info: We hold sporting event with the aim of creating awareness on the importance of exercising in the society. Trough sports we change the negative behavior of the people in the society. We encourage a healthy living devoid of diseases, immorality and drug abuse.

lender.name: Johan Svahn
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship will make the world a better place for everyone. If people around the world can afford to start up their own company and hire a person or two, the poverty will be greatly reduced and the living standards will be improved.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time as a IT Manager and also run my own company which produces educational media. I am also part-owner in two other companies; a Chinese game studio and our family business together with my father.

lender.name: Florence
lender.loan_because: People need it. It is that simple...

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I once had a business, and I know the importance of capital to keep a successful business running.
lender.occupational_info: I am a firefighter in a local town. I also work another job with a bicycle shop in the USA. I love bicycles, and I love firefighting, and I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Klemen & Janja
lender.loan_because: ...because we like to!
lender.occupational_info: Handcraft, independent eduction of arts and living skills.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: we're all brothers and sisters
lender.occupational_info: i am a senior executive who travels throughout western Europe, consulting multinational corporations. but my true love is entrepreneurship and the power of the human spirit to accomplish what seems impossible.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: We are all a part of this world and we should share what we have. Because I have a very small retirement pension I know what it is to make the best of it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 60 and retired and teach textile art to people who are interested in it. My husband and I have an organic farm and are self sufficient. We have 7 children.

lender.name: Total
lender.occupational_info: A family run business, TOTAL eMEDICAL is committed to helping you care for your health needs as we would our own. Working with you & your doctor, TeM supplies you with all of the durable medical supply products you need to live your best life possible

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I belive that if you can, you should help. Kiva seems lika a good way to do it.

lender.occupational_info: My work focus is varied but when I work in education it is to learn and to share different skills, so that we can all benefit and grow together.

lender.loan_because: Up to 1000 in minutes.Apply Now.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It is the best way I can help out.

lender.name: Consideritdone

I had the incredible opportunity to study a postgraduate programme and knowing the great needs there exist in my country and abroad, I was moved to help in some way. So, here I am! :)

lender.name: Sheillie
lender.loan_because: I'd like to be able touch other people's lives and make a difference somehow; to be able to give back as way of thanks/gratitude for my own blessings.

lender.occupational_info: When people are arrested in the US and they only speak Spanish, I interpret for them when they go to court and talk to their attorneys.

lender.name: gary
lender.loan_because:
I suppose the simple answer to that is that I wish to help others to reach their potential. Through Kiva I can, in a small way, make that happen.
I have 2 beliefs that I try to live by :
- Give people food & their hunger will be quenched; show people how to plant & they will never have to be hungry again.
- Treat others as you would like to be treated; what goes around comes around.
I believe that Kiva follows these principles.
lender.occupational_info:
I design, setup, run and market online ventures as well as helping others achieve success.
An example is below.

I want to help :)
My work is becoming more and more about pushing paper (or the computer equivalent-actually, I miss good old paper!), so I want to continue making a difference at the most basic levels...
I am lucky to have had the opportunities that I did, and, thanks to those opportunities, doubly lucky to be able to support others in pursuit of their dreams.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I view this as constructive savings. The delinquency rate is low, the 'interest' 'earned' is someone else's potential success. I'd rather trust these good people than my bank! I invest an additional $50/month just like it's savings but I know it's not supporting a banker's mistakes, it's now influencing the success of an entrepener who wouldn't otherwise be qualified for credit.
Just about to hit $10,000 mark in overall loans (I roll payments back to new loans).

lender.name: Sherrie
lender.loan_because: I wish to give to your good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kindergarten in a school in a small town in California, USA. I enjoy watching them learn and grow and become confident in their skills and abilities.

lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jinnan
lender.loan_because: Money is only as valuable as what you do with it.
lender.occupational_info: I consult, design and develop strategic web applications for innovative businesses, with a keen interest in global development and sustainability. I also study Chinese medicine full time at RMIT.

lender.name: Benita
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I write music and sing.

lender.name: Glynnis Forsberg
lender.loan_because: I want people to be given a chance to be sucessful in the world and not have to see America where that's the only place to have The Dream.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and help my friends, family, and community with the talents God has given me! :)

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Although I do not necessarily expect my donation to "change the world" in any major way (or necessarily go to the particular individual or organization that I have, somewhat arbitrarily, chosen to fund), I like the idea that there is this pot of money out there for people that need it that can be tapped into.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: My daughter is from Asia, So I've seen how much part of a paycheck can change someone's entire life.

lender.name: Alethia
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all connected and we are all citizens of this world and it's important to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: Right now my main focus is school, however I do hold a job at a restaurant on occasion.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is my responsibility as a global citizen to help others whenever I can.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about helping entrepreneurs all over the world succeed. A small amount of money can help entrepreneurs in the developing world achieve their goals and make a better, healthier life for themselves. I'm happy knowing that I've made a measurable difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a graduate student studying to become an Addictions Counsellor. I'm also close to achieving my goal of becomming a yoga instructor and personal trainer.

lender.name: Clay and Kim
lender.loan_because: I realize the importance of borrowing money fom my own line of business, and am happy to do what others have done for me.
lender.occupational_info: Landlord and real estate investor. Kim is a registered nurse.

lender.name: Helmut
lender.loan_because: I want to "give back" and make a contribution to alleviate poverty by giving people the chance to engage in entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: Selling power products for a multinational company, providing safer and more efficient ways for energy transmission and distribution all over the world

lender.name: Wesley DeBusk
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I've been very poor during my life and I want to be able to help people that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We have an online business selling Spice Blends from Around the World many of which are Gluten Free, Salt Free, MSG Free and Preservative Free. Also Chili Peppers, Curries, Sea Salts, and Barbecue Rubs.
